system.description: Lighting the rag and throwing the bottle takes an action. When the lit cocktail strikes a solid surface, it explodes hitting on target and 1 random target, dealing 1d6 damage. On a failure to throw, both targets are random. A creature that gets a success on an Agility challenge roll takes no damage, while a creature that gets a 0 or lower catches fire.
